name: Tap Colors
description:
Tap colors is an game made to test a person's vision for the depth of color. This game was created for the Global Multimedia Leo Club providing a game that everyone can play by simply clicking a different color from other colors without complicated 
mechanics. 

This game has unlimited levels and each level is generated so the level will always be 
different no matter how much you try, starting from a level with a low number that is easy to pass to a high level that requires super human eyes.
